<small>Also see: [[H6242]]</small>

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶשֶׂר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲשָׂרָה‎</span><sub>176</sub> **noun masculine** and **feminine** ==ten== (Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew; perhaps [[BDB#MI|MI]]<sup>33</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עשרֿ‎</span>; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עשר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עסר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עשרת‎</span>, etc.; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עשר‎</span> SabDenkm<sup>No. 11 b, l. 5, 6,</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עשרת‎</span> and compounds [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Chrest. 48</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ešertu;***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲסַר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַסְרָא‎</span>; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲשַׂר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַשְׂרָא‎</span>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Nabataean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עשר‎</span>, all = ***ten***; Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עשרתא‎</span> ***the Ten*** (rulers)); — 

**masculine** (with **noun feminine**) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶ֫שֶׂר‎</span> [[2Sam.15.16|2Sam 15:16]] + 53 t. (absolute and construct usually indistinguishable); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָ֑שֶׁר‎</span> [[1Kgs.7.43|1Kgs 7:43]]; [[1Chr.6.46|1Chr 6:46]] **feminine** (c. **noun masculine**): absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲשָׂרָה‎</span> [[Gen.24.10|Gen 24:10]] + 69 t.; construct (probably) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲשֶׂ֫רֶת‎</span> [[1Sam.17.18|1Sam 17:18]] + 46 t.; feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲשָׂרֹת‎</span> [[Exod.18.21|Exod 18:21]] + 2 t.; — on plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶשְׂרִים‎</span>, 20, see below; — 

**1.** ***a ten***, only feminine plural ***tens*** in phrase <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂרֵי ע‎</span> ***captains of tens*** [[Exod.18.21|Exod 18:21]]; [[Exod.18.25|Exod 18:25]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Deut.1.15|Deut 1:15]]. 

**2.** ***ten***, enumerating person or things, usually without other numbers: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶ֫שֶׂר‎</span> before feminine plural noun, [[Gen.45.23|Gen 45:23]] + 43 t. after noun [[1Kgs.7.27|1Kgs 7:27]]; [[1Kgs.7.43|1Kgs 7:43]] + late passages [[Josh.15.57|Josh 15:57]]; [[Josh.21.5|Josh 21:5]]; [[Josh.21.26|Josh 21:26]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]), [[1Chr.6.46|1Chr 6:46]]; [[2Chr.4.7|2Chr 4:7]] before <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּאַמָּה‎</span> = ***ten cubits*** [[1Kgs.6.3|1Kgs 6:3]]; [[1Kgs.6.25|1Kgs 6:25]]; [[1Kgs.6.26|1Kgs 6:26]]; [[1Kgs.7.23|1Kgs 7:23]]; [[1Kgs.7.24|1Kgs 7:24]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲשָׂרָה‎</span> before masculine plural noun, [[Gen.45.23|Gen 45:23]] + 25 t. (including <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲלָפִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> = 10,000 [[2Sam.18.3|2Sam 18:3]]; [[2Kgs.24.14|2Kgs 24:14]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲשֶׂרֶת‎</span> [[BDB#Qr|Qr]]); before n.collective <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּקָר‎</span> [[1Kgs.5.3|1Kgs 5:3]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶכֶב‎</span> [[2Kgs.13.7|2Kgs 13:7]] also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֶחֶם הַוֶּה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[1Sam.17.17|1Sam 17:17]] ***these ten loaves***, compare [[1Kgs.14.3|1Kgs 14:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֶף‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Ezek.45.1|Ezek 45:1]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶשְׂרִיס א‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Co|Co]] [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]] Toy; after masculine plural noun [[Gen.32.16|Gen 32:16]] (twice in verse); [[Gen.43.3|Gen 43:3]] (all [[BDB#E|E]]), [[Josh.17.5|Josh 17:5]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[Num.29.23|Num 29:23]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[1Kgs.7.43|1Kgs 7:43]]; [[2Chr.4.6|2Chr 4:6]]; [[2Chr.4.8|2Chr 4:8]]; [[Dan.1.12|Dan 1:12]]; [[Dan.1.14|Dan 1:14]]; [[Dan.1.15|Dan 1:15]] ; after n.collective <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צאֹן‎</span> [[2Chr.30.24|2Chr 30:24]] noun omitted, that is ***men***, [[Gen.18.32|Gen 18:32]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Amos.5.3|Amos 5:3]]; [[Ezra.8.4|Ezra 8:4]] that is ***shekels*** (weight) [[Gen.24.22|Gen 24:22]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Num.7.14|Num 7:14]] + 13 t. [[Num.7|Num 7]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָהָב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶסֶף‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> (that is ***shekels***, value) [[2Sam.18.11|2Sam 18:11]] that is ***measures*** (of grain) [[Hag.2.16|Hag 2:16]] with article ***the ten*** [[Gen.18.23|Gen 18:23]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; that is ***men***), [[Neh.11.1|Neh 11:1]] (***id.*** = ***every ten***); as predicate [[Exod.27.12|Exod 27:12]] (twice in verse) = [[Exod.38.12|Exod 38:12]] (twice in verse) (all [[BDB#P|P]]) . 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲשֶׂ֫רֶת‎</span> before masculine plural noun [[Exod.34.28|Exod 34:28]] + 18 t., + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּעֲשֶׂרֶת הַיָּמִים‎</span> [[1Sam.25.38|1Sam 25:38]] (on article compare Weir in [[BDB#Dr|Dr]], but dubious; probably omitted, so [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]), + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲלָפִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> = 10,000 [[Judg.1.4|Judg 1:4]] + 26 t.; noun omitted <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּסֶף‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> (that is ***shekels***) [[Judg.17.10|Judg 17:10]]. 

**3.** rarely + other number: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶשֶׂר‎</span> after larger number, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵאָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁנִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָע‎</span> [[Gen.50.22|Gen 50:22]]; [[Gen.50.26|Gen 50:26]]; [[Josh.24.29|Josh 24:29]] (all [[BDB#E|E]]), [[Judg.2.8|Judg 2:8]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> before larger number <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶשֶׂר שָׁנִים וּתְשַׁע מֵאוֺת שָׁנָה‎</span> [[Gen.5.14|Gen 5:14]] ([[BDB#P|P]]). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲשָׂרָה‎</span> after larger number, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵאָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַעֲשָׂרָה הַזְּכָרִים‎</span> [[Ezra.8.12|Ezra 8:12]], compare (noun preceding) [[Ezra.1.10|Ezra 1:10]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲשָׂרָה‎</span> after smaller number, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבְעָה שְׁקָלִים וַעֲשָׂרָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַכָּ֑סֶף‎</span> [[Jer.32.9|Jer 32:9]] = ***seventeen shekels***; before smaller number + singular noun <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲשָׂרָה וַחֲמִשָּׁה שֶׁקֶל‎</span> [[Ezek.45.12|Ezek 45:12]], but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲמִשִּׁים‎</span> joining <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲשָׂרָה‎</span> to preceding, [[BDB#A|ᵐ5]]<sup>A</sup> [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Co|Co]] and others
